name: Strangler

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 13, sneak attack +1d6, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike.

sections.body: Whenever you successfully maintain a grapple and choose to deal damage, you can spend a swift action to deal your sneak attack damage to the creature you are grappling.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Throttling the life out of enemies is second nature to you.
